Franklin.CoolSprings Galleria: CoolSprings Galleria is an enclosed regional shopping mall in the Cool Springs commercial and residential corridor between Franklin and Brentwood, Tennessee, 15 miles (24 km) south of Nashville. It opened in 1991, and has 4 department stores and over 165 stores on two floors totaling 1,117,689 square feet (103,836.7 m2), including the 500-seat Oasis Food Court. CoolSprings Crossings is an adjacent power center.
